about_the_game:
Aquilon Lust: From Chains to Trust is a visual novel with interactive elements, unveiling another chapter in the story of the dungeon city of Aquilon. The game introduces new characters while expanding the narrative threads from previous entries in the Aquilon series, creating a cohesive and immersive storyline. Your choices in dialogue will shape not only the course of events but also the game’s ultimate ending.

Story:

Welcome to Aquilon – a fantastical city dominated by a central dungeon tower. You Ren, a young merchant aspiring to open his own apothecary. His ordinary life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers a mysterious girl hiding in his wagon.

Yuna, a runaway slave bred for brutal arena battles, seeks freedom from her violent past. By choosing to protect her, Ren becomes entangled in a web of danger and intrigue. Can you keep her safe and uncover the secrets of Aquilon?

Key Features:

  • Engaging story: Explore new layers of the enigmatic city and its dark underbelly.

  • Choice-driven gameplay: Every decision shapes the outcome and impacts the fate of the characters.

  • Immersive atmosphere: Dive into the unique setting of Aquilon, filled with mystery and danger.

  • Returning characters: Meet familiar faces from previous Aquilon stories.

  • Live2D intimate scenes: Experience dynamic and captivating moments of connection.

Will you break the chains and build trust, or will the shadows of Aquilon consume you? The choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains elements of voyeurism, scenes of a sexual nature, and light erotic scenes. All characters depicted in this game are over 21 years of age

name: Aquilon Lust: From Chains to Trust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-630
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-630
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260
